Materia.GetAll: SELECT materia_na AS Nombre, materia_de AS Contenido FROM materia ORDER BY materia_na
Materia.Search: SELECT materia_na AS Nombre, materia_de AS Contenido FROM materia WHERE materia_na LIKE @SearchTerm OR materia_de LIKE @SearchTerm ORDER BY materia_na
Materia.Exists: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM materia WHERE materia_na = @Nombre
Materia.Update: UPDATE materia SET materia_na = @Nombre, materia_de = @Descripcion WHERE materia_na = @NombreOriginal
